thread.section_title: Vital Choice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vital Choice | vitalchoice.com | 6 of 274
thread.title: Keri

author: Keri
title: Keri
text: I have been looking at this website for almost a year now. I am very health conscious and a wellness professional. I like shellfish, but do not like fish. If it is even remotely fishy tasting I can not eat it. I know that if the salmon is very fresh it won't taste like fish. I decided to finally give Vital Choice a try after reading countless reviews over the last several months. I ordered the 6 oz. Skinless Boneless King Salmon - So glad I did! WOW! The salmon was amazing! It had no fishy aroma whatsoever and the flavor and texture was delicious. My husband and mother-in-law also said "this is the best salmon I've ever eaten". That's all we talked about for a week was how good the salmon was and couldn't wait to eat it again. I will definitely be ordering again and hoping the quality remains the same. If it does, I will be a very loyal customer. Thank you Vital Choice!
